statements: SELECT * FROM student_advising_system LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, advisor_id, current_semester FROM student_advising_system WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name, graduation_requirements FROM student_advising_system WHERE current_semester = 8;
SELECT * FROM student_advising_system WHERE advisor_id = 101 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_recommendations FROM student_advising_system WHERE current_semester < 6;
SELECT * FROM student_advising_system WHERE advisor_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, student_name, current_semester FROM student_advising_system WHERE current_semester < 5;
SELECT student_name, advisor_id FROM student_advising_system WHERE advisor_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT student_id, student_name, graduation_requirements FROM student_advising_system WHERE LENGTH(graduation_requirements) > 100;
SELECT student_id, student_name, advisor_id FROM student_advising_system ORDER BY advisor_id DESC, student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_id, progress_percent, grade FROM student_progress WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT course_id, completion_date FROM student_progress WHERE progress_percent > 80;
SELECT * FROM course_recommendations WHERE recommended_for_major = TRUE;
SELECT course_id, recommended_courses, prerequisites FROM course_recommendations WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE grade='A' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress_percent FROM student_progress WHERE completion_date <= '2022-12-31' AND grade IN ('A', 'B') ORDER BY progress_percent DESC;
SELECT course_id, recommended_courses, prerequisites FROM course_recommendations WHERE recommended_for_major = TRUE AND recommended_for_minor = FALSE;
SELECT student_id, progress_percent, completion_date FROM student_progress WHERE progress_percent >= 80 AND grade IS NOT NULL ORDER BY progress_percent DESC, completion_date ASC;
SELECT course_id, recommended_courses, prerequisites FROM course_recommendations WHERE course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM student_progress WHERE grade = 'A') ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress
SELECT student_id, grade, course_id FROM student_progress
SELECT course_id, recommended_course_id FROM course_recommendations ORDER BY course_id DESC
SELECT * FROM graduation_requirements WHERE credit_hours_required > 120
SELECT major, credit_hours_required FROM graduation_requirements WHERE major = 'Computer Science'
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM student_progress WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_recommendations WHERE course_id IN (SELECT recommended_course_id FROM course_recommendations WHERE course_id = 101);
SELECT major, credit_hours_required FROM graduation_requirements WHERE major LIKE '%Engineering%';
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_progress WHERE grade >= 'B' ORDER BY student_id ASC, course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, major, advisor_id FROM Students;
SELECT course_id, course_name, credits, department FROM Courses;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, semester, grade FROM Enrollments;
SELECT requirement_id, department, required_credits FROM GraduationRequirements;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC, student_id ASC
SELECT student_name, major FROM Students WHERE advisor_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY credits DESC
SELECT student_id, course_id, semester FROM Enrollments WHERE grade = 'A' OR grade = 'B'
SELECT department, required_credits FROM GraduationRequirements
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, major FROM Students WHERE start_year > 2018;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Courses ORDER BY credit_hours DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN StudentCourses ON Students.student_id = StudentCourses.student_id;
SELECT department, recommended_course_id FROM CourseRecommendations JOIN Courses ON CourseRecommendations.recommended_course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, start_year FROM Students WHERE start_year >= 2019 ORDER BY start_year DESC;

SELECT student_name, grade, course_name FROM Students JOIN StudentCourses ON Students.student_id = StudentCourses.student_id JOIN Courses ON StudentCourses.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours, department FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours > 3 OR department = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY credit_hours DESC;
SELECT student_name, recommended_course_id FROM Students JOIN CourseRecommendations ON Students.student_id = CourseRecommendations.student_id ORDER BY student_name ASC;
